home.question: If you have any question on JHipster:

overview.title: Overview
overview.message: The registry is a database of Kevoree models mainly used by KevScript interpreters to resolve TypeDefinitions and DeployUnits

api.title: API
api.message: It provides a REST API to GET the content of the database, but needs a secured OAuth2 authentication for any PUT, POST operations.

letsgo.title: Let's go
letsgo.message: You can register right now and publish your own content to the Kevoree registry within minutes.
